name: Don't Wake the Dragon
description:
Get ready for a dangerous adventure in a randomly generated dungeon where you can get rich or die by your greed.

Your goal is to sneak into the treasury guarded by a sleeping dragon and steal as much treasures as you can carry.
Be careful not to make any noise because when the dragon notices you, the only solution is to run away - and it may be hard to run with a bag full of treasures.
Consider that sometimes taking fewer treasures can save you from death, so in this game quite often LESS IS MORE.

made for Blackthornprod Gamejam 3
